content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to help onboard new BA's to the TKM account, explain specifics of working with client and provide a set of standardized practices and approaches for faster project onboarding we develop a checklist that will help with your first steps.
